resources.string: <html> <head></head> <body style="text-align:justify;color:black;background-color:transparent;"> Founded in August of 2008 and based in San Francisco, California, Airbnb is a trusted community marketplace for people to list, discover, and book unique accommodation around the world. It connects people looking to rent their homes with people who are looking for accommodations. In Airbnb hosts list and rent out their unused spaces, and travelers search for and book accommodations. </body> </html>
